# Block Large Language Model datasets from training on this website
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow: /

User-agent: Omgili
Disallow: /

User-agent: VercelBot
Disallow: /

# Allow AI assistants only when a real user is directly viewing the content
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Disallow: /

User-agent: *
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Allow: /
